item.title: Green Ruby News #226
item.description:
The end

GreenRuby weekly newsletter ceases to exist.
No more email will be sent.
No more update will be made.


After 4 years of relentless gathering of links, we have to come to this painful decision to quit. Few months ago, I got distracted, and Xenor stepped up to manage the publication. But now he's in a transition too and it's time for us to take a decision.

It's been a blast. Thank you all for your support. And special thanks to Xenor and Tysliu, without their active involvement this newsletter may have died 2 years ago. Now let's move on. There is going to be more adventures down the road.

After this email is sent, the whole list of subscribers will be deleted, so we won't have any ways to reach you anymore. Feel free to reach us at news@greenruby.org

You can still reach the archives of the past newsletters on http://greenruby.org


mose
